title: The Elevator
description: Three SHORT SEXY HOT reads all having taken place in THE ELEVATOR!!! Smoking hot, light hearted, romances that will leave you screaming for more! Who would believe that boring work elevator could be such an exciting place! If the elevator could talk, the stories it would tell!!! Go sit yourself down, put your feet up and enjoy, purely erotic, delicious romances, hard to put down reads.
author: Tara Rose
